messages.message:
It's great to see a classification example! I'd like to dig into this feedback a bit more: "It's quite tedious to change classes on long documents (takes forever to load) and the splits are really sensitive, which have been leaving off pages of some of the files.".

For slowness - is the slowness when you click "Reclassify" and it takes a long time to classify the package? (likely because it has so many pages)

For accuracy - who would be best to talk to about this? Do you have specific classes you've been iterating on? It would be helpful to talk to someone who understands the classes/docs better, since at first glance, it looks mostly correct to me :joy:
